document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Soto! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Explore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">thyself! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Therein </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">thyself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">shalt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">find </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">"Undiscovered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Continent" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Settler </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Mind. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Soto! Explore thyself!
